short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add accessible DMM buttons to IMDB, MDBList, AniDB, TraktTV, and Bittorrent sites with magnet links

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Debrid Media Manager allows you to curate a media library of unlimited size. This browser extension simplifies the process for curators by adding DMM buttons directly to popular platforms and torrent indexers.

Simply search for the movie or TV show you want on IMDB, MDBList, AniDB, TraktTV, or any Bittorrent site (e.g., Piratebay, 1337x, Nyaa, Torrentgalaxy) and instantly add it to your DMM library via the integrated DMM button on pages with magnet links.

With MDBList, you can filter content using specific criteria, such as IMDB scores or country of origin, helping you discover new favorites. Experience a streamlined way to build and enjoy your media collection.
